events.name: Chiang Mai Flood Crisis
events.description: Severe flooding has struck Chiang Mai, displacing families and causing extensive damage to homes and infrastructure. Volunteers are needed to help distribute essential supplies, assist in evacuation, and support relief efforts.

events.name: Wildfire Response in Maule Region
events.description: Volunteers needed for evacuation assistance and shelter support for families affected by wildfires in the Maule region.

events.name: Beach Cleanup Initiative
events.description: Join us in cleaning up the beaches of Phuket to protect marine life and maintain the beauty of our natural environment. Volunteers will be provided with cleaning tools and safety gear.
